title: Sheep: handle with care. Parts I-III
creator_credit: Bob Scarfe and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: A three part program that shows the different aspects of sheep management. Part 1 deals with Mustering, mouthing, teeth trimming, drenching and foot care. Part 2 deals wth crutching, vaccinating, lamb marking and drafting. Part 3 deals with shearing, branding, dipping and jetting
creator_credit_for_label: Bob Scarfe and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
